title: obs-cli configuration
description: Configuration schema for obs-cli - a command-line remote control for OBS

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor support

port.description: OBS WebSocket server port (4455 for OBS 28+, 4444 for older versions)

password.description: OBS WebSocket server password (leave empty if authentication is disabled)

profiles.description: Named server profiles for connecting to multiple OBS instances

host.description: OBS WebSocket server host for this profile

port.description: OBS WebSocket server port for this profile

password.description: OBS WebSocket server password for this profile
